Class LogHelper

extends java.lang.Object
    Simple class to help logger setup.

      • getLogger

        public static java.util.logging.Logger getLogger(java.lang.String name)
        Get a new Logger. It will have the level and handlers as defined by the user when using setupLogger(java.util.logging.Handler[])
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the logger
        Returns:
        A new ready to use logger
